validation_rules: Each competency must have a valid EQF or proficiency level
Framework reference should follow a known standard (e.g., e-CF:D.11, ESCO:S4D3)
Descriptions must clearly distinguish scope and context
Each competency should align with at least one domain or role
references: ESCO (European Skills, Competences, Qualifications and Occupations)
European Commission (2022). GreenComp: The European sustainability competence framework

competency_examples.title: Needs Identification
competency_examples.description: Actively listens to internal/external customers and accurately records and interprets statements.

competency_examples.title: Promote Environmental Sustainability
competency_examples.description: Encourages environmentally sustainable practices in digital contexts.
